name: MULTNOMAH COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist the Multnomah County Sheriff's Office with the re-negotiation of its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement to house federal prisoners.
Assist the Multnomah County Sheriff's Office with the re-negotiation of its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement to house federal prisoners.
Assist Multnomah County Sheriffs Office in negotiating a new per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service in its facilities.
